sentences.sentence: Scientists also find it difficult to dig up Kudzu.
sentences.translation: 科学家们也发现挖掘葛根很困难。

sentences.sentence: At the very least, kudzu serves as an example of the unexpected results that can come from nonnative plants.
sentences.translation: 至少，葛根可以作为一个例子，证明非本地植物会带来意想不到的结果。

sentences.sentence: In which content many is Kudzu root element.
sentences.translation: 其中含量较多的是葛根素。
